choose.when: SELECT * FROM HOSPITAL ORDER BY HOSPITAL_ID
choose.otherwise: SELECT * FROM HOSPITAL WHERE HOSPITAL_NAME LIKE '%' || #{hospitalName} || '%' ORDER BY HOSPITAL_ID

mapper.select: SELECT H.HOSPITAL_ID, H.HOSPITAL_NAME, H.ADDRESS, H.WEEKDAY_OPENINGTIME, H.WEEKEND_OPENINGTIME, H.TEL, H.HOLIDAY_CHECK, H.LUNCH_HOUR, H.LAT, H.LNG, LISTAGG(D.DEPARTMENT_NAME, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY D.DEPARTMENT_NAME) AS DEPARTMENT_NAMES FROM HOSPITAL H, HOSPITAL_DEPARTMENT HD, DEPARTMENT D WHERE H.HOSPITAL_ID = HD.HOSPITAL_ID AND HD.DEPARTMENT_ID = D.DEPARTMENT_ID AND H.HOSPITAL_ID = #{hospitalId} GROUP BY H.HOSPITAL_ID, H.HOSPITAL_NAME, H.ADDRESS, H.WEEKDAY_OPENINGTIME, H.WEEKEND_OPENINGTIME, H.TEL, H.HOLIDAY_CHECK, H.LUNCH_HOUR, H.LAT, H.LNG

SELECT M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NAME, DI.DEPARTMENT_ID, DI.IMG_FILE, DI.FILE_NAME, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DOCTOR_LIKE DL WHERE DL.DOCTOR_ID = M.MEMBER_ID ) AS LIKE_COUNT FROM MEMBER M, DOCTOR_INFO DI WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = DI.MEMBER_ID AND DI.HOSPITAL_ID = #{hospitalId} ORDER BY DI.DEPARTMENT_ID, M.MEMBER_ID

SELECT RESERVATION_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO RESERVATION(reservation_id, member_id, hospital_id, department_id, reservation_date, reservation_time, reservation_member, reservation_tel, reservation_content) VALUES ( #{reservationId}, #{memberId}, #{hospitalId}, #{departmentId}, #{reservationDate}, #{reservationTime}, #{reservationMember}, #{reservationTel}, #{reservationContent} )
mapper.select: SELECT M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_TEL, LISTAGG(D.DEPARTMENT_ID, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY D.DEPARTMENT_ID) AS DEPARTMENT_IDS, LISTAGG(D.DEPARTMENT_NAME, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY D.DEPARTMENT_ID) AS DEPARTMENT_NAMES FROM MEMBER M, HOSPITAL_DEPARTMENT HD, DEPARTMENT D WHERE M.MEMBER_ID=#{memberId} AND HD.HOSPITAL_ID = #{hospitalId} AND HD.DEPARTMENT_ID = D.DEPARTMENT_ID GROUP BY M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_TEL
SELECT R.RESERVATION_ID, R.RESERVATION_DATE, R.RESERVATION_TIME, D.DEPARTMENT_NAME FROM RESERVATION R, DEPARTMENT D WHERE R.HOSPITAL_ID = #{hospitalId} AND R.DEPARTMENT_ID = D.DEPARTMENT_ID
SELECT HC.CHECK_ID, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NAME, HC.HEALTH_MEMO, HC.NOWDATE FROM HEALTH_CHECK HC, MEMBER M WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = HC.MEMBER_ID AND M.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY CHECK_ID
